Now<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> went up<S>305</S> together<S>1909</S> <S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S> at the hour<S>5610</S> of prayer<S>4335</S>, being the ninth<S>1766</S> hour.
And<S>2532</S> a certain<S>5100</S> man<S>435</S> lame<S>5225</S> <S>5560</S> from<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> mother's<S>3384</S> womb<S>2836</S> was carried<S>941</S>, whom<S>3739</S> they laid<S>5087</S> daily<S>2250</S> <S>2596</S> at<S>4314</S> the gate<S>2374</S> of the temple<S>2411</S> which<S>3588</S> is called<S>3004</S> Beautiful<S>5611</S>, to ask<S>154</S> alms<S>1654</S> of<S>3844</S> them that entered<S>1531</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>;
Who<S>3739</S> seeing<S>1492</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> about<S>3195</S> to go<S>1524</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S> asked<S>2065</S> <S>2983</S> an alms<S>1654</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, fastening his eyes<S>816</S> upon<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> with<S>4862</S> John<S>2491</S>, said<S>2036</S>, Look<S>991</S> on<S>1519</S> us<S>2248</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he gave heed<S>1907</S> unto them<S>846</S>, expecting<S>4328</S> to receive<S>2983</S> something<S>5100</S> of<S>3844</S> them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>2036</S>, Silver<S>694</S> and<S>2532</S> gold<S>5553</S> have<S>5225</S> I<S>3427</S> none<S>3756</S>; but<S>1161</S> such as<S>3739</S> <S>5124</S> I have<S>2192</S> give I<S>1325</S> thee<S>4671</S>: In<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> of Nazareth<S>3480</S> rise up<S>1453</S> and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he took<S>4084</S> him<S>846</S> by the right<S>1188</S> hand<S>5495</S>, and lifted him up<S>1453</S>: and<S>1161</S> immediately<S>3916</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>939</S> and<S>2532</S> ancle bones<S>4974</S> received strength<S>4732</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he leaping up<S>1814</S> stood<S>2476</S>, and<S>2532</S> walked<S>4043</S>, and<S>2532</S> entered<S>1525</S> with<S>4862</S> them<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, walking<S>4043</S>, and<S>2532</S> leaping<S>242</S>, and<S>2532</S> praising<S>134</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S> saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> walking<S>4043</S> and<S>2532</S> praising<S>134</S> God<S>2316</S>:
And<S>5037</S> they knew<S>1921</S> that<S>3754</S> it<S>846</S> was<S>2258</S> he<S>3778</S> which<S>3588</S> sat<S>2521</S> for<S>4314</S> alms<S>1654</S> at<S>1909</S> the Beautiful<S>5611</S> gate<S>4439</S> of the temple<S>2411</S>: and<S>2532</S> they were filled<S>4130</S> with wonder<S>2285</S> and<S>2532</S> amazement<S>1611</S> at<S>1909</S> that which had happened<S>4819</S> unto him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as the lame man<S>5560</S> which was healed<S>2390</S> held<S>2902</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S>, all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S> ran together<S>4936</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1909</S> the porch<S>4745</S> that is called<S>2564</S> Solomon's<S>4672</S>, greatly wondering<S>1569</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when Peter<S>4074</S> saw<S>1492</S> it, he answered<S>611</S> unto<S>4314</S> the people<S>2992</S>, Ye men<S>435</S> of Israel<S>2475</S>, why<S>5101</S> marvel ye<S>2296</S> at<S>1909</S> this<S>5129</S>? or<S>2228</S> why<S>5101</S> look ye so earnestly<S>816</S> on us<S>2254</S>, as though<S>5613</S> by our own<S>2398</S> power<S>1411</S> or<S>2228</S> holiness<S>2150</S> we had made<S>4160</S> this man<S>846</S> to walk<S>4043</S>?
The God<S>2316</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> of Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S>, the God<S>2316</S> of our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, hath glorified<S>1392</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>3816</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>; whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> delivered up<S>3860</S>, and<S>2532</S> denied<S>720</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>2596</S> the presence<S>4383</S> of Pilate<S>4091</S>, when he was determined<S>2919</S> to let<S>630</S> him <S>1565</S> go<S>630</S>.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> denied<S>720</S> the Holy One<S>40</S> and<S>2532</S> the Just<S>1342</S>, and<S>2532</S> desired<S>154</S> a murderer<S>5406</S> <S>435</S> to be granted<S>5483</S> unto you<S>5213</S>;
And<S>1161</S> killed<S>615</S> the Prince<S>747</S> of life<S>2222</S>, whom<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath raised<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>; whereof<S>3739</S> we<S>2249</S> are<S>2070</S> witnesses<S>3144</S>. <sup>Prince: or, Author</sup>
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> through<S>1909</S> faith<S>4102</S> in his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> hath made<S>4732</S> this man<S>5026</S> strong<S>4732</S>, whom<S>3739</S> ye see<S>2334</S> and<S>2532</S> know<S>1492</S>: yea<S>2532</S>, the faith<S>4102</S> which is<S>1325</S> by<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> hath given<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> this<S>5126</S> perfect soundness<S>3647</S> in the presence<S>561</S> of you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, I wot<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> through<S>2596</S> ignorance<S>52</S> ye did<S>4238</S> it, as<S>5618</S> did also<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> rulers<S>758</S>.
But<S>1161</S> those things, which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> before had shewed<S>4293</S> by<S>1223</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> prophets<S>4396</S>, that Christ<S>5547</S> should suffer<S>3958</S>, he hath<S>4137</S> so<S>3779</S> fulfilled<S>4137</S>.
Repent ye<S>3340</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, and<S>2532</S> be converted<S>1994</S>, that<S>1519</S> your<S>5216</S> sins<S>266</S> may be blotted out<S>1813</S>, when<S>3704</S> the times<S>2540</S> of refreshing<S>403</S> shall come<S>302</S> <S>2064</S> from<S>575</S> the presence<S>4383</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>;
And<S>2532</S> he shall send<S>649</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, which before was preached<S>4296</S> unto you<S>5213</S>:
Whom<S>3739</S> the heaven<S>3772</S> <S>3303</S> must<S>1163</S> receive<S>1209</S> until<S>891</S> the times<S>5550</S> of restitution<S>605</S> of all things<S>3956</S>, which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath spoken<S>2980</S> by<S>1223</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> holy<S>40</S> prophets<S>4396</S> since<S>575</S> the world began<S>165</S>.
For<S>1063</S> Moses<S>3475</S> truly<S>3303</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> the fathers<S>3962</S>,<S>3754</S> A prophet<S>4396</S> shall<S>450</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> your<S>5216</S> God<S>2316</S> raise up<S>450</S> unto you<S>5213</S> of<S>1537</S> your<S>5216</S> brethren<S>80</S>, like<S>5613</S> unto me<S>1691</S>; him<S>846</S> shall ye hear<S>191</S> in<S>2596</S> all things<S>3956</S> whatsoever<S>3745</S> <S>302</S> he shall say<S>2980</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>.
And<S>1161</S> it shall come to pass<S>2071</S>, that every<S>3956</S> soul<S>5590</S>, which<S>3748</S> <S>302</S> will<S>191</S> not<S>3361</S> hear<S>191</S> that<S>1565</S> prophet<S>4396</S>, shall be destroyed<S>1842</S> from among<S>1537</S> the people<S>2992</S>.
Yea<S>2532</S>, and<S>1161</S> all<S>3956</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> from<S>575</S> Samuel<S>4545</S> and<S>2532</S> those that follow after<S>2517</S>, as many as<S>3745</S> have spoken<S>2980</S>, have<S>4293</S> likewise<S>2532</S> foretold<S>4293</S> of these<S>5025</S> days<S>2250</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the covenant<S>1242</S> which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> made<S>1303</S> with<S>4314</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> Abraham<S>11</S>, And<S>2532</S> in thy<S>4675</S> seed<S>4690</S> shall<S>1757</S> all<S>3956</S> the kindreds<S>3965</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> be blessed<S>1757</S>.
Unto you<S>5213</S> first<S>4412</S> God<S>2316</S>, having raised up<S>450</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>3816</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, sent<S>649</S> him<S>846</S> to bless<S>2127</S> you<S>5209</S>, in<S>1722</S> turning away<S>654</S> every one<S>1538</S> of you<S>5216</S> from<S>575</S> his iniquities<S>4189</S>.
